message.content: {"id": "11863", "title": "Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow removal", "description": "When attempting to use the 'Update' action for a Test Suite, the action only displays the current content of the Test Suite (directory or zip file) without allowing any modifications. Renaming the action and dialog to 'Recreate Test Suite' would solve this problem.", "OB": "The 'Update' action for Test Suites does not allow any modifications and only displays the current content.", "EB": "The action and dialog for modifying Test Suites should be renamed to 'Recreate Test Suite' to accurately represent its functionality.", "SR": "Modify the Test Suite action and dialog to allow for modifications and rename them to 'Recreate Test Suite' for clarity."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
